comments.body: "WELCOME WIN TER 2023"Material: WoodTools: Special tools for wood carvingType: Traditional Carving ReliefSize: 25x50 cmDuration: 15 dayThe theme of this art contest is Winter/Holiday, and I made a relief carving of Mr.Roo trying to give prizes to each house. Using color patterns to make the carving more vivid and coated with varnish to make it more luster and the color of the wood comes out. Actually, this is very suitable for wall displays and placed in front of the door when in winter.Regardstaufik123 VIDEO REVIEWFull Album Carving Processhttps://www.talkimg.com/album/UwqCRoobet Username: taufik123bech32 BTC address: bc1qcqf82ys3afxx04ga89rgew7hhn75e0hz6cnxcu

comments.body: CATEGORY: CRAFT    A WINTERRIFIC GIFT from Roobet    No matter how cold or how deep the snow,The warmth of these memories will always glow.In ROO-ville, dear friend, the truth is clear,Every day won is a reason to cheer!Cheers to a whole year filled of joy, winnings, and prizes from the amazing Roobet team!Please watch the video to see the motor works:https://youtube.com/shorts/Kd6Dlx7QH4U?si=yEuT5NcXvIeTofPbhttps://imgur.com/U1OWfSeProcess: https://imgur.com/a/TBmEbrRRoobet username: lucifurBTC ADDRESS: bc1qqha8dnvmsu736pc0jaq90hgz977lnkll83c9eh
